canonical_policy.description: Merge latest classification documents (common, backend, frontend, api, db, notes) into a single canonical spec. Remove duplicates by content hash and prefer newer versions (higher version numbers or later generated_at timestamps) in case of conflicts.

how_to_update: 1. Update classification documents and bump their versions. 2. Regenerate this canonical spec with the updated component_manifest. 3. Commit classification docs and canonical spec together to ensure consistency.

changes: Updated API spec to v1.3.2 by merging endpoints and parameters missing in v1.3.1
API specification now fully covers v1.3.0 and v1.3.1 contents; other categories unchanged
Preparation for canonical update following API spec v1.3.1 release (Japanese translation and JSON)
Clarified default timezone (Asia/Tokyo) and explicit vs. UTC usage in common spec
Documented progress endpoint and fallback behavior in common spec
Added implementation notes for toast message priority
